original_title: 365 Days: A Year in Happy Valley
overview: Depicting a year in the life of a small town caught in the center of the high-profile Penn State scandal, this powerful film reveals how it affected the community: showcasing the strength and resolve of those who live in and cherish what is known as "Happy Valley."
tagline: After Everyone Else Left, We Stayed
title: 365 Days: A Year in Happy Valley
